documents.document: @LewSOS Plus we get a kickback from the credit card loyalty schemes - with the cost of those kickbacks shared with those who pay cash.
I've had this work from home job for a year now - and I'm still managing to shave, shower, and get dressed before starting work each day. :)

I am at a kitten party. We are not taking kittens home. Not even just one. Nope.

@ChelleHopeBlog Hope you feel better soon! #crossesfingersforthesleepcure

@alans_world Now that's some Nazi punching I can support.
@irisshackleton Definitely a great time to bring out the "I blame the parents" line.

@Danjite @2TAPU Ick. I got a dairy owner to remove a subtly neo-nazi sign in Martinborough a few months ago. They're definitely around.
@thomasbeagle @2TAPU Ooops, missed out a word. "variably active". We marched against them in 2004, seem to have died down since.

@HonestUniverse Today's releases give me the info I really wanted (I get UFB by second half 2019) so I'm good. :)
@paulbrislen To be honest I just wanted to find out where it was up to so today's releases covered it anyway.
@HonestUniverse They were having a bob each way - said it wasn't covered, then gave a sort of answer so no actual refusal/grounds.
@thomasbeagle And then they refused the rest of the questions because it was publicly available. As of today.
Interesting, MBIE considers that the reasons why UFB2 took so long to sign is an opinion, and therefore not official information. #denied
@kiwibrew @FlyAirNZ Even just a few months ago it was a mix of jets and props, seems to be all props now?

@KimDotcom For better or worse, you're a very polarising figure that would weaken any movement you attached yourself to. So please don't.

Realising that all the politically minded people I know are scared, and resolving to be more tolerant of over-excited views and rhetoric.

@paulbrislen We got them together and, while they're not related, they cooperate/squabble like siblings. But we're getting a dog soon...

@dfrancishirst I support abortion being available when required. None of this persuading multiple doctors your mental health is at risk.
@dfrancishirst I'm definitely keen to jump up and down if English shows any signs of wanting to further restrict abortion in NZ.
@dfrancishirst Probably because he's not changing abortion law or policy. (Although we should fix our abortion law to make it easier.)
Mysteries of my life: There was a roughly 4 year period where strangers would compliment me on my hands. Why did it start? Why did it stop?

@Kris_Bartley But a week apart? They're being dicks. Ignore them. 2/2
@Kris_Bartley If your event had been at the same time and appealing to the same audience, it might make sense to coordinate better. 1/2
@timClicks I assume it's because he's regarded by many to be a prick with a taste for meddling maliciously in politics and law.
@whaeapower We should change that. I support abortion on making an appointment ("demand" always sounds like hard work).

@gtiso Is the rain jacket billed as waterproof? You could claim against the retailer of the jacket for the failure & consequential damages.
